description:
Klein & Carney Co., L.P.A.: Doing Justice Is Our Business

Klein & Carney is a Cleveland-based law firm committed to protecting the rights and interests of accident victims across northern Ohio and beyond. With more than 50 years of combined experience, our attorneys blend legal and professional insights drawn from a broad range of personal injury practice areas, including:

Personal Injury Law:

  • Wrongful death
  • Serious injuries
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Workers' compensation
  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Defective drugs
  • Defective medical devices
  • Slip-and-fall accidents and premises liability
  • Dog bites and animal attacks
  • Injuries caused by texting drivers

No one should have to face the aftermath of a serious accident on their own. At Klein & Carney, we are committed to providing our clients with the counsel and resources needed to stand up to the insurance companies while pursuing full and just compensation. Whether reaching a settlement through negotiations or building a case for trial, we carry out thorough investigations, gather evidence and work closely with medical professionals and other industry experts to reach the most favorable outcome on our clients' behalf.

Our track record of success speaks to the commitment and preparation we bring to each case. We have achieved multimillion-dollar awards and settlements on behalf of clients in motor vehicle accidents and numerous other types of personal injury claims. Our attorneys have also been selected by our peers in the legal community for inclusion in Super Lawyers magazine and have received an AV Preeminent rating* through Martindale-Hubbell.

Personal Attention To Every Client

If you or a loved one has been injured in a car accident, due to the negligence of a health care provider or in a premises liability incident, reach out to us and schedule a free initial consultation. You can reach us 24/7. Our office is located in Cleveland, Ohio, and we proudly represent clients throughout the state.

*AV®, BV®, AV Preeminent® and BV Distinguished® are registered certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell Peer Review Ratings fall into two categories – legal ability and general practice standards.
